# Rule 7 â€“ Speak in English Only
This is an English-speaking server. All in-character and out-of-character communication must be in English.
Character accents are a built-in trait in Space Station 14 and are fully allowed. Accents may naturally cause altered spelling, phrasing, or pronunciation.
Limited non-English words or phrases are allowed only when they: - Are produced through an accent trait (e.g., occasional foreign words, curses, or songs), - Are not used to convey important information, - Are not used to evade moderation or exclude other players from understanding ongoing roleplay.
Extended conversations, instructions, or information must always remain in English.
